welcome.title: Welcome to Camberley 478 scout group
welcome.subtitle: where every child has the right to an adventure

intro.title: Our group
intro.line1: We currently have: 2 Beaver colonies, 1 Cub pack and 1 Scout troop.
intro.line2: Camberley 478 Scout Group was formed after the original groups in Camberley (4th, 7th and 8th) were at risk of closure.
intro.line3: The group has now grown significantly since 2022 and our numbers are increasing further.

footer.address2: 270 London Rd, Royal Military Academy, Camberley GU15 3JP
